title: Thread-Safe Collections
description: Thread-safe and scalable collection classes in the `System.Collections.Concurrent` namespace. Includes `ConcurrentDictionary<TKey,TValue>`, `ConcurrentQueue<T>`, `ConcurrentStack<T>`, `ConcurrentBag<T>`, and `BlockingCollection<T>` for producer-consumer scenarios. These collections use fine-grained locking or lock-free mechanisms for high-performance multi-threaded access.
shortDescription: Concurrent collections like `ConcurrentDictionary` and `BlockingCollection` for multi-threaded access.
